title: Ehlers-Freemasons are working for Roosevelt(masons that pushed A
description:
For english-only speaking:
This book is in german language. English title would be: Freemasons are working for Roosevelt - Masonic documents on cooperation between Roosevelt and Freemasonry (1993). First published in 1943 by Erich Ehlers this rare book presents some documentation that links the Grand Orient lodges of Europe to the political machinery of United States and their secret dealings that would involve America into World war 2. Although Roosevelt promised to keep America out of this war, the historic record indicated otherwise, namely that some secret circles actually wanted a war and were using all their influence for pushing all nations of the world into it. 65 pages, some documents.
